cast.name: 萨维卡·恰雅德 Savika Chaiyadej

this_title: หลวงพี่เท่ง
introduction: Brother Theng (Pongsak Pongsuwan), a young monk, moves to a temple in a village where villagers still foolishly believe in ghosts and spirits. Thinking of how to develop a better way of life for the villagers, he intends to renew the villagers' belief to more reasonable ways with the help from his followers like Song (Note Chern-Yim) and Pian (Sarawut Poomthong). But it's not s...
foreign_title: หลวงพี่เท่ง
